document.full_text: french foreign minister alain juppe made a last-ditch effort on thursday to revive peace negotiations between israelis and palestinians before a likely showdown at the united nations in september.
document.title: french minister bids to revive middle east talks
lines_and_colors: french foreign minister alain juppe made a last-ditch effort on thursday to revive peace negotiations between israelis and palestinians before a likely showdown at the united nations in september.
